  · rcases h1 with g1 | g2

    · right; exact Or.inl g2
  · right; exact Or.inr h2
· intro h
  rcases h with h1 | h2
  · left; exact Or.inl h1
  · rcases h2 with g1 | g2

    · right; exact g2

3.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· intro x h
  rw[mem_sInter]
  intro t ht
  rw[mem_pair] at ht
  rcases ht with h1 | h2
  · rw[h1]
    exact h.left
  · rw[h2]
    exact h.right
· intro x h
  rw[mem_sInter] at h
  have hA := h A
  have hB := h B
  rw[mem_pair] at hA hB
  have eqA : A = A := rfl
  have eqB : B = B := rfl
  apply And.intro
  · exact hA (Or.inl eqA)
  · exact hB (Or.inr eqB)

4.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· intro x h
  rw[mem_sInter] at h
  apply And.intro
  · intro t ht
    have g1 := h t
    have g2 : t ∈ F ∪ G := Or.inl ht
    exact g1 g2
  · intro t ht
    have g1 := h t
    have g2 : t ∈ F ∪ G := Or.inr ht
    exact g1 g2
· intro x h
  rw[mem_sInter]
  intro t ht
  rcases ht with gF | gG
  · have hF := h.left
    exact hF t gF
  · have hG := h.right
    exact (hG t) gG

· intro h s hs x hx
  have := h hx
  exact this s hs
· intro h x hx s hs
  have := h s hs
  exact this hx

· exact Or.inl h
· apply Or.inr
  intro t ht
  have g1 := h1 t
  have g2 := g1 ht
  have g3 := hx (A ∪ t)
  have g4 := g3 g2
  rcases g4 with g5 | g6
  · by_contra g
    exact h g5
  · exact g6

4.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· intro x hx
  rcases hx with h1 | h2
  · have hA : A ∈ {A , B} := by rw[mem_pair]; left; rfl
    exact ⟨ A , ⟨ hA, h1⟩ ⟩ 
  · have hB : B ∈ {A , B} := by rw[mem_pair]; right; rfl
    exact ⟨ B , ⟨ hB, h2⟩ ⟩ 
· intro x hx
  obtain ⟨ w, hw ⟩ := hx
  have hwl := hw.left
  have hwr := hw.right
  rcases hwl with gl | gr
  · rw[gl] at hwr
    exact Or.inl hwr
  · rw[gr] at hwr
    exact Or.inr hwr

5.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· intro x hx
  obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := hx
  have hwl := hw.left
  have hwr := hw.right
  rcases hwl
  · left; exact ⟨ w, ⟨ h , hwr ⟩ ⟩ 
  · right; exact ⟨ w, ⟨ h , hwr ⟩ ⟩ 
· intro x hx
  rcases hx
  · obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := h
    have hwl := hw.left
    have hwr := hw.right
    have gw : w ∈ F ∪ G := Or.inl hwl
    exact ⟨ w , ⟨ gw , hwr ⟩ ⟩ 
  · obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := h
    have hwl := hw.left
    have hwr := hw.right
    have gw : w ∈ F ∪ G := Or.inr hwl
    exact ⟨ w , ⟨ gw , hwr ⟩ ⟩

· intro h s hs x hx
  have g : x ∈ ⋃₀ F := ⟨ s , ⟨ hs , hx ⟩ ⟩ 
  exact h g
· intro h x hx
  obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := hx
  have hwl := hw.left
  have hwr := hw.right
  have g := h w hwl
  exact g hwr

7.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· intro x h
  have hl := h.left
  have hr := h.right
  obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := hr
  have hwl := hw.left
  have hwr := hw.right
  have l1 : A ∩ w = A ∩ w := rfl
  have l2 : A ∩ w ∈ {s | ∃ u ∈ F, s = A ∩ u} := by rw[mem_setOf]; exact ⟨ w , hwl , l1 ⟩ 
  have l3 : x ∈ A ∩ w := ⟨ hl , hwr ⟩ 
  exact ⟨ A ∩ w , l2 , l3 ⟩ 
· intro x hx
  obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := hx
  have hwl := hw.left
  have hwr := hw.right
  rw[mem_setOf] at hwl
  obtain ⟨ t , ht ⟩ := hwl
  have htl := ht.left
  have htr := ht.right
  apply And.intro
  · rw[htr] at hwr
    exact hwr.left
  · rw[htr] at hwr
    exact ⟨ t , htl, hwr.right ⟩

1.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· intro x hx
  rw[mem_compl_iff] at hx
  apply And.intro
  · by_contra h
    rw[mem_compl_iff] at h
    push_neg at h
    have gx : x ∈ A ∪ B := Or.inl h
    exact hx gx
  · by_contra h
    rw[mem_compl_iff] at h
    push_neg at h
    have gx : x ∈ A ∪ B := Or.inr h
    exact hx gx
· intro x hx
  rw[mem_compl_iff]
  have hxl := hx.left
  have hxr := hx.right
  rw[mem_compl_iff] at hxl hxr
  by_contra h
  rcases h
  · exact hxl h
  · exact hxr h

  · right; exact ⟨ hxl , h ⟩

  left
  exact hx

· exact h

1.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· intro x hx s hs
  rw[mem_setOf] at hs
  by_contra h
  rw[← mem_compl_iff] at h
  have gx : x ∈ ⋃₀ F := ⟨ sᶜ , hs , h ⟩ 
  exact hx gx
· intro x hx
  rw[mem_compl_iff]
  by_contra h
  obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := h
  have hwl := hw.left
  have hwr := hw.right
  rw[← compl_compl w] at hwl
  have g1 := hx wᶜ 
  have g2 := g1 hwl
  exact g2 hwr

2.code:
apply Subset.antisymm
· rw[← compl_compl (⋃₀ {s | sᶜ ∈ F})]
  apply compl_subset_compl_of_subset
  intro x hx s hs
  by_contra h
  rw[← mem_compl_iff] at h
  rw[← compl_compl s] at hs
  have g : x ∈ ⋃₀ {s | sᶜ ∈ F} := ⟨ sᶜ , hs , h ⟩ 
  exact hx g
· intro x hx
  by_contra h
  rw[← mem_compl_iff, compl_compl] at h
  obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := hx
  have hwl := hw.left
  have hwr := hw.right
  rw[mem_setOf] at hwl
  have g := h wᶜ hwl
  exact g hwr

3.code:
obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := h2
have h1w := h1 w
have hwl := hw.left
have g1 := h1w hwl
obtain ⟨ z , hz ⟩ := g1
have hzl := hz.left
have hwr := hw.right
have g2 := hwr z hzl
have hzr := hz.right
have g3 : z = w := Subset.antisymm g2 hzr
rw[g3] at hzl
exact ⟨ w , hwl , hzl ⟩

have hxl := hx.left
obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := hxl
have hwl := hw.left
have g1 := h1 w
have g2 := g1 hwl
obtain ⟨ z , hz ⟩ := g2
have hzl := hz.left
have hxr := hx.right
have g3 := hxr z
have g4 := g3 hzl
have hwr := hw.right
have hzr := hz.right
exact ⟨ w ∩ z , hzr , hwr , g4 ⟩

5.code:
intro x hx
have hxl := hx.left
have hxr := hx.right
obtain ⟨ w , hw ⟩ := hxl
have hwr := hw.right
have hwl := hw.left
by_cases h : w ∈ Gᶜ
· have l : w ∈ F ∩ Gᶜ := ⟨ hwl , h ⟩ 
  exact ⟨ w , l , hwr ⟩ 
· rw[← mem_compl_iff, compl_compl] at h
  have l : x ∈ ⋃₀ G := ⟨ w , h , hwr ⟩ 
  by_contra g
  exact hxr l

6.code:
intro x ⟨ hxl , hxr ⟩ 
obtain ⟨ w , ⟨ hwl , hwr ⟩  ⟩ := hxl
by_cases h : w ∈ G
· exact ⟨ w , ⟨ hwl , h ⟩ , hwr ⟩ 
· rw[← mem_compl_iff] at h
  have l1 : x ∈ ⋃₀ (F ∩ Gᶜ) := ⟨ w , ⟨ hwl , h ⟩ , hwr ⟩ 
  have l2 := h1 l1
  have l3 := l2.right
  have hxr := hxr
  by_contra g
  exact l3 hxr

7.code:
intro x ⟨ hxl , hxr ⟩
rw[mem_sUnion]
obtain ⟨ w , ⟨ hwl , hwr ⟩ ⟩ := hxl
rw[mem_compl_iff, mem_sInter] at hxr
push_neg at hxr
obtain ⟨ z , ⟨ hzl , hzr ⟩ ⟩ := hxr
rw[← mem_compl_iff] at hzr
have l1 : ∃ v ∈ G, w ∩ zᶜ = w ∩ vᶜ := by use z
have l2 : ∃ u ∈ F, ∃ v ∈ G, w ∩ zᶜ = u ∩ vᶜ := by use w
have l3 : x ∈ w ∩ zᶜ := ⟨ hwr , hzr ⟩
use w ∩ zᶜ
exact ⟨ l2 , l3 ⟩

8.code:
have h2 := h1 {{s} | s ∈ A}
have h3 : ⋃₀ {{s} | s ∈ A} = A := by
  apply Subset.antisymm
  · intro x hx
    obtain ⟨ w , ⟨ hwl , hwr ⟩ ⟩ := hx
    rw[mem_setOf] at hwl
    obtain ⟨ a , ⟨ hal , har ⟩ ⟩ := hwl
    rw[← har] at hwr
    rw[mem_singleton_iff] at hwr
    rw[← hwr] at hal
    exact hal
  · intro x hx
    use {x}
    apply And.intro
    · rw[mem_setOf]
      use x
    · rw[mem_singleton_iff]
have h := h2 h3
rw[mem_setOf] at h
obtain ⟨ w , hwr , hwl ⟩ := h
use w
rw[hwl]
